channel.title: Adding Bandos to Client! Help :)
channel.description:
When I spawn the Bandos Npc, a lil dwarven miner shows up hehe :) Im sure this is because the actual Bandos is not added to the client as well as my source. I need help doing this as I have never done anything client sided before. Can someone please help me to add Bandos to my client/source so that all death/att/standing emotes are working properly without glitching ;)
I'm using the older, close to Original PI version(wanting to do all the coding of things myself in order to learn)
Thanks, Basak

item.title: Adding Bandos to Client! Help :)
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

I realize that but how. I checked the entitydef file and bandos is already added in there… and all attack/death emotes are in the npc handler… Why does bandos still show up as a dwarf when spawned? What am I missing?

My bad, thought this was server help, anyway, I will. But I still do need help

What do you mean by “Uncomment”?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Bandos to Client! Help :)
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

Uncomment the things in your Entity class.

Next time, post in client hacking help section.

Read full topic

do it client sided first.
